item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An open discussion forum for ArXiv papers (242 points | 76 comments)
2. Concrete clickbait: next time you share a spomenik photo, think abt what it mean (2016) (60 points | 24 comments)
3. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (40 points | 11 comments)
4. Asking the wrong questions (2017) (148 points | 78 comments)
5. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (60 points | 9 comments)
6. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (452 points | 160 comments)
7. Baiting the bot (91 points | 43 comments)
8. Have ‘hobby’ apps become the new social networks? (87 points | 70 comments)
9. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (176 points | 135 comments)
10. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (251 points | 24 comments)
11. LibrePythonista allows running IPython code in a LibreOffice spreadsheet (4 points | 1 comment)
12. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (573 points | 260 comments)
13. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (180 points | 12 comments)
14. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (270 points | 150 comments)
15. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (186 points | 15 comments)
16. A day in the life of the fastest supercomputer (12 points | 7 comments)
17. The "email is authentication" pattern (240 points | 334 comments)
18. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (126 points | 24 comments)
19. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (132 points | 16 comments)
20. Battlestar Galactica: Technical Manual (2005) (53 points | 32 comments)
21. LuaJIT PR: Add Support for RISC-V 64 (47 points | 10 comments)
22. The worsening Raspberry Pi RP2350 E9 erratum situation (76 points | 12 comments)
23. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (21 points | discuss)
24. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (124 points | 41 comments)
25. Groups underpin modern math (100 points | 38 comments)
26. Rethinking addiction as a chronic brain disease (53 points | 66 comments)
27. Things to know about the Great Wave (251 points | 80 comments)
28. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (144 points | 85 comments)
29. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (174 points | 89 comments)
30. The little-known life of the scarfing tool (2003) (15 points | 2 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
